descriptionHtml:
Standalone follower based on the character from the anime [i]Re:Zero − Starting Life in Another World.
[/i]
[b]Follower Details

[/b]Race: Nord
Body Type: UNPB
Combat: Magic
Spells: Buffed Ice spikes and Healing
Default Outfit: Bar Keeper Clothes
Location: Whiterun Hall of the Dead

[b]Permissions[/b]

As long as I'm credited in some way, do whatever you want with it.
